meanings.definition: A book in which a person keeps a record of their bank transactions.
meanings.sent1: I always write down my transactions in my bankbooks.
meanings.sent2: She showed me her bankbooks to prove her savings.
meanings.sent3: The bankbooks had a secret code written on the last page.
meanings.sent4: Her bankbooks were like a treasure map to her financial history.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out bankbooks told the story of her diligent saving habits.

meanings.sent1: They kept all their financial records in separate bankbooks.
meanings.sent2: The bankbooks were neatly arranged on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The twins each had their own set of bankbooks.
meanings.sent4: The stack of bankbooks looked like a colorful tower.
meanings.sent5: The collection of bankbooks represented years of hard work and savings.
